title: Tiny's Coffee Northeast
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local coffee shop offering a full menu including breakfast bagels, lunch sandwiches, soups and salads all made from local ingredients; also an ssortment of pastries including vegan and gluten-free options. Casual decor in a small semi-industrial space with several other businesses sharing the same building.
